ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the Multi-Sector Air Pollutants Regulations Amendment Regulations (Part 1 - Biomass)
PrecisRegulations amending the MULTI-SECTOR AIR POLLUTANTS REGULATIONS (PART 1 â€“ BIOMASS) in order to ensure that boilers and heaters that combust predominantly solid or liquid biomass are excluded from the Multi-Sector Air Pollutants Regulations.
